name: Cathy's Crafts
description:
A classic time management game in a brand new setting!
Manage your own crafting shop while enjoying the story of Cathy and Ming, a slightly eccentric cat! Craft loving customers will enter your store to create beautiful objects, but they'll need your help to make the most creative decorations. While assisting them, be sure to feed Ming from time to time. The cat's extremely cute & cuddly, but gets really grumpy when hungry! You'll play in 6 different locations and you can customize your shops to give them the look you want. If you win all trophies you'll be able to call yourself a real Craft Shop Star! Have fun!

The first location is fully free with an in-game unlock for the full complement of locations.
No additional purchases after the full unlock are necessary to experience all game features!

Game Features:
- Enjoy the 1st season of Cathy's Crafts
- Play 60 lovely time management levels in 6 different locations
- Win all 18 trophies and become a real crafting star
- Help your customers create beautiful objects
- Delight yourself in the cute story of talented young Cathy and the cat, Ming


Write a review to support us!

Follow Cathy on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/cathyscraftsgame

Enjoy GameHouse Original Stories:
- Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears
- Delicious - Emily's Home Sweet Home
- Delicious - Emily's New Beginning
- Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever
- Fabulous - Angela's Sweet Revenge
- Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal
